extra: Was the third or sixth son of the Duke of Bedford and was called Lord John Russell out of courtesy although it was not expected that he would claim the Dukedom as the third son. He was not a peer until he was granted the Earldom in 1861
Since John Russell became Earl straight away his son took the courtesy title of Viscount Amberly until his fathers death in 1878
I cannot find his entry in mps.csv
